message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.MM

The paper proposes a new user login framework using 3D in-air-handwriting for gesture-based human-computer interface. This involves computer vision techniques for recognizing and analyzing finger motions in 3D space, which falls under the sub-category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) and Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the security aspects of the proposed framework, which involves cryptography and cyber security techniques, falling under the sub-categories of Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) and Cybersecurity (cs.CY). Finally, the paper uses machine learning techniques such as Support Vector Machines (SVM) and deep neural networks, which falls under the sub-category of Multimedia (cs.MM).
